name: Eagle Strike D
description:
This is an action and flight game in military base environment.
I am currently developing the game. In this demo, you control a helicopter and do different missions in enemy base. To complete the level, you must complete all the missions then return back to your base. The level has limited ammo and fuel, therefore, you should manage your resources and focus on doing the missions.
This game is inspired by the series of Desert Strike, Jungle Strike and Urban Strike from Sega Genesis.

Controller UPmove forward DOWNmove backward RIGHTturn right LEFTturn left Ppick up item Odrop item ENTERconsume item TABselect target Qfire missile Wfire rocket Efire gun Cchange camera view ESCopen ingame menu
